column1: NATIONAL STATISTICS FOR NEW FIXED-RATE, FULLY-AMORTIZING RESIDENTIAL MORTGAGES ON OWNER-OCCUPIED, SITE-BUILT PROPERTIES IN THE UNITED STATES
All Conventional, Conforming-Sized Mortgages with Term of 30 Years
Source: National Mortgage Database (NMDB®), Federal Housing Finance Agency
Note: The explanation for each row category and column statistic is provided in the Decriptions tab. NA is not applicable.  The tables reflect the most up to date data available.
